		<title>Florida school massacre suspect on authorities' radar in 2016: media</title>

		<description>PARKLAND, Fla. (Reuters) - A teenager accused of fatally shooting 17 people at a Florida high school was investigated by police and state officials as far back as 2016 after slashing his arm in a social media video, and saying he wanted to buy a gun, but authorities determined he was receiving sufficient support, newspapers said on Saturday.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=e7X9E88jKyQ:XqPX3q0AGJo:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=e7X9E88jKyQ:XqPX3q0AGJo:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=e7X9E88jKyQ:XqPX3q0AGJo:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=e7X9E88jKyQ:XqPX3q0AGJo:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=e7X9E88jKyQ:XqPX3q0AGJo:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~4/e7X9E88jKyQ" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~3/e7X9E88jKyQ/florida-school-massacre-suspect-on-authorities-radar-in-2016-media-idUSKCN1G10BI</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-florida-shooting/florida-school-massacre-suspect-on-authorities-radar-in-2016-media-idUSKCN1G10BI?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</guid>
        <category>domesticNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 09:37:48 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-florida-shooting/florida-school-massacre-suspect-on-authorities-radar-in-2016-media-idUSKCN1G10BI?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Firearms debate rages as Florida rally coincides with gun show</title>

		<description>MIAMI (Reuters) - Student survivors of a mass shooting that killed 17 people at a Florida high school called for gun restrictions on Saturday during an angry and somber rally, but attendees at a nearby gun show said firearms could not be blamed for the massacre.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=wOCDTkCtrZw:0qXJ_BZvDCY:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=wOCDTkCtrZw:0qXJ_BZvDCY:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=wOCDTkCtrZw:0qXJ_BZvDCY:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=wOCDTkCtrZw:0qXJ_BZvDCY:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=wOCDTkCtrZw:0qXJ_BZvDCY:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~4/wOCDTkCtrZw" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~3/wOCDTkCtrZw/firearms-debate-rages-as-florida-rally-coincides-with-gun-show-idUSKCN1G10WB</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-florida-shooting-guns/firearms-debate-rages-as-florida-rally-coincides-with-gun-show-idUSKCN1G10WB?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</guid>
        <category>domesticNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 08:53:46 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-florida-shooting-guns/firearms-debate-rages-as-florida-rally-coincides-with-gun-show-idUSKCN1G10WB?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Father who forgave son for family's murder asks Texas to spare his life</title>

		<description>AUSTIN, Texas (Reuters) - A Texas man who survived a deadly domestic attack hatched by his son is pushing the state to grant clemency to the condemned man, although it has never spared a death row inmate solely at the formal request of the victim's family.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=vInTAcfXEDw:ryBVDmD3glQ:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=vInTAcfXEDw:ryBVDmD3glQ:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=vInTAcfXEDw:ryBVDmD3glQ:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=vInTAcfXEDw:ryBVDmD3glQ:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=vInTAcfXEDw:ryBVDmD3glQ:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~4/vInTAcfXEDw" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~3/vInTAcfXEDw/father-who-forgave-son-for-familys-murder-asks-texas-to-spare-his-life-idUSKCN1G20IV</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-texas-execution/father-who-forgave-son-for-familys-murder-asks-texas-to-spare-his-life-idUSKCN1G20IV?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</guid>
        <category>domesticNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 08:08:30 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-texas-execution/father-who-forgave-son-for-familys-murder-asks-texas-to-spare-his-life-idUSKCN1G20IV?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Republicans face first test of tax cuts' power to sway voters</title>

		<description>WASHINGTON, Penn (Reuters) - Mark Marran, an operations manager for a Fortune 500 company, voted for Donald Trump. Two weeks ago he noticed an extra $100 in his bimonthly pay check, courtesy of sweeping tax cuts passed by the Republican Congress late last year.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=3LEhcGdGMdk:5qshmAxoNkg:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=3LEhcGdGMdk:5qshmAxoNkg:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=3LEhcGdGMdk:5qshmAxoNkg:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=3LEhcGdGMdk:5qshmAxoNkg:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=3LEhcGdGMdk:5qshmAxoNkg:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~4/3LEhcGdGMdk" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~3/3LEhcGdGMdk/republicans-face-first-test-of-tax-cuts-power-to-sway-voters-idUSKCN1G2053</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-election-pennsylvania/republicans-face-first-test-of-tax-cuts-power-to-sway-voters-idUSKCN1G2053?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</guid>
        <category>domesticNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 01:10:14 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-election-pennsylvania/republicans-face-first-test-of-tax-cuts-power-to-sway-voters-idUSKCN1G2053?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>U.S. charges Russians with 2016 U.S. election tampering to boost Trump</title>

		<description>WASHINGTON (Reuters) - A Russian propaganda arm oversaw a criminal and espionage conspiracy to tamper in the 2016 U.S. presidential campaign to support Donald Trump and disparage Hillary Clinton, said an indictment released on Friday that revealed more details than previously known about Moscow's purported effort to interfere.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=8rcUPG5WDq8:a6t4L06AgNk:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=8rcUPG5WDq8:a6t4L06AgNk:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=8rcUPG5WDq8:a6t4L06AgNk:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=8rcUPG5WDq8:a6t4L06AgNk:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=8rcUPG5WDq8:a6t4L06AgNk:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~4/8rcUPG5WDq8" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~3/8rcUPG5WDq8/u-s-charges-russians-with-2016-u-s-election-tampering-to-boost-trump-idUSKCN1G022U</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trump-russia-indictment/u-s-charges-russians-with-2016-u-s-election-tampering-to-boost-trump-idUSKCN1G022U?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</guid>
        <category>domesticNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 18:25:38 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trump-russia-indictment/u-s-charges-russians-with-2016-u-s-election-tampering-to-boost-trump-idUSKCN1G022U?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Facebook plans to use U.S. mail to verify IDs of election ad buyers</title>

		<description>WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Facebook Inc will start using postcards sent by U.S. mail later this year to verify the identities and location of people who want to purchase U.S. election-related advertising on its site, a senior company executive said on Saturday.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=tmHO1621Kj8:w_-YruNyUxc:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=tmHO1621Kj8:w_-YruNyUxc:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=tmHO1621Kj8:w_-YruNyUxc:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=tmHO1621Kj8:w_-YruNyUxc:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=tmHO1621Kj8:w_-YruNyUxc:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~4/tmHO1621Kj8" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~3/tmHO1621Kj8/facebook-plans-to-use-u-s-mail-to-verify-ids-of-election-ad-buyers-idUSKCN1G10VD</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-election-facebook/facebook-plans-to-use-u-s-mail-to-verify-ids-of-election-ad-buyers-idUSKCN1G10VD?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</guid>
        <category>domesticNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 16:14:34 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-election-facebook/facebook-plans-to-use-u-s-mail-to-verify-ids-of-election-ad-buyers-idUSKCN1G10VD?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Weinstein Company removes president and chief operating officer Glasser</title>

		<description>(Reuters) - The board of the Weinstein Company has dismissed the beleaguered film studio's president and chief operating officer, less than a week after he was cited for failing to act on employee harassment complaints.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=Ak899VVgi-k:jE5v4VW-520:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=Ak899VVgi-k:jE5v4VW-520:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=Ak899VVgi-k:jE5v4VW-520:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=Ak899VVgi-k:jE5v4VW-520:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=Ak899VVgi-k:jE5v4VW-520:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~4/Ak899VVgi-k" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~3/Ak899VVgi-k/weinstein-company-removes-president-and-chief-operating-officer-glasser-idUSKCN1G10VF</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-people-harvey-weinstein/weinstein-company-removes-president-and-chief-operating-officer-glasser-idUSKCN1G10VF?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</guid>
        <category>domesticNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 16:11:12 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-people-harvey-weinstein/weinstein-company-removes-president-and-chief-operating-officer-glasser-idUSKCN1G10VF?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Confluence of crises crashes Trump's 'Infrastructure Week'</title>

		<description>WASHINGTON (Reuters) - This was supposed to be “Infrastructure Week” for U.S. President Donald Trump, a time to unveil a long-promised plan to create jobs by revitalizing America's roads and bridges.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=mQfeO-Zsyyo:NZc_0I-_FFw:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=mQfeO-Zsyyo:NZc_0I-_FFw:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=mQfeO-Zsyyo:NZc_0I-_FFw:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=mQfeO-Zsyyo:NZc_0I-_FFw:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=mQfeO-Zsyyo:NZc_0I-_FFw:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~4/mQfeO-Zsyyo" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~3/mQfeO-Zsyyo/confluence-of-crises-crashes-trumps-infrastructure-week-idUSKCN1G02M6</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trump-russia-week/confluence-of-crises-crashes-trumps-infrastructure-week-idUSKCN1G02M6?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</guid>
        <category>domesticNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 18:58:48 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trump-russia-week/confluence-of-crises-crashes-trumps-infrastructure-week-idUSKCN1G02M6?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>U.S. top court mulls whether to take up 'Dreamers' dispute</title>

		<description>WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The U.S. Supreme Court on Friday discussed in private how to handle President Donald Trump's appeal of a judge's decision blocking his plan to end protections for young illegal immigrants dubbed "Dreamers," and the nine justices could announce as early as Tuesday whether they will take up the case.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=kr4hXfmeLOw:gfJJMHFw3rI:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=kr4hXfmeLOw:gfJJMHFw3rI:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=kr4hXfmeLOw:gfJJMHFw3rI:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=kr4hXfmeLOw:gfJJMHFw3rI:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=kr4hXfmeLOw:gfJJMHFw3rI:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~4/kr4hXfmeLOw" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~3/kr4hXfmeLOw/u-s-top-court-mulls-whether-to-take-up-dreamers-dispute-idUSKCN1G01R5</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-court-immigration/u-s-top-court-mulls-whether-to-take-up-dreamers-dispute-idUSKCN1G01R5?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</guid>
        <category>domesticNews</category>
		<pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 15:13:06 -0500</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-court-immigration/u-s-top-court-mulls-whether-to-take-up-dreamers-dispute-idUSKCN1G01R5?feedType=RSS&feedName=domesticNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Trump had affair with Playboy model: New Yorker report</title>

		<description>WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. President Donald Trump had an affair with a Playboy model at the same time he was in a relationship with a porn star and the National Enquirer tabloid paid the model $150,000 to prevent her story being made public, the New Yorker reported on Friday.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=yT35z5uPvUI:Z-9wnYwjrW4:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=yT35z5uPvUI:Z-9wnYwjrW4:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=yT35z5uPvUI:Z-9wnYwjrW4:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?a=yT35z5uPvUI:Z-9wnYwjrW4:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/Reuters/domesticNews?i=yT35z5uPvUI:Z-9wnYwjrW4:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/Reuters/domesticNews/~4/yT35z5uPvUI" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
